author: Special Correspondent
text:
D. Adaikalasamy (70), a security guard, deployed at an Automated Teller Machine (ATM) site belonging to a public sector bank at Tiruchi Junction was found dead on Sunday. He had worked in the police force and retired as a head constable. Police said he was found dead in the ATM room.

His son Vijay tried to reach his father over mobile phone as he did not return home after work. Sources said Vijay found his father dead inside the ATM room when he went there in the morning.
title: Security guard found dead
